setStandbyPlayer(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.LM26.controller.controllerHandler.SetupHandler
after that server notifies of a disconnected player or that a client decided to stop playing, this method is called and it sets the standby status to the client in standby, it sends a message to all clients that this one went in standby and then it counts how many players remain in the game, because when only one player remains it calls the endGame-Controller-method
